front.title: Formal Notation for Robust Header Compression (ROHC-FN)

abstract.t: This document defines ROHC-FN (RObust Header Compression - Formal Notation): a formal notation to specify field encodings for compressed formats when defining new profiles within the ROHC framework. ROHC-FN offers a library of encoding methods that are often used in ROHC profiles and can thereby help simplifying future profile development work.
